thread.title: Aging gangster accused of 'Goodfellas' heist goes on trial
thread.title_full: Aging gangster accused of 'Goodfellas' heist goes on trial

title: Aging gangster accused of 'Goodfellas' heist goes on trial
text: Aging gangster accused of 'Goodfellas' heist goes on trial By Associated Press | October 19, 2015 @ 11:52 am In this Jan. 23, 3014 courtroom drawing, Vincent Asaro, left, is joined by his attorney, Gerald McMahon, at federal court in New York. Asaro, 78, was named along with his son, Jerome, and three other defendants in wide-ranging indictment alleging murder, robbery, extortion, arson and other crimes from the late 1960s through 2013. Asaro goes to trial in October 2015 for his role in the 1978 Lufthansa heist which Martin Scorsese immortalized in his film "Goodfellas." (AP Photo/Elizabeth Williams, File)
